message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. I know it's worth a lot to you, and this price reflects that value. Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints. I'm willing to come down to $10,500. This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm really trying to get the best deal possible, and I'm willing to walk away if we can't agree on a price.
